question: A person going to temple gets irresistible sense of ideas to abuse God, which cannot be resisted, likely diagnosis is:
exp: Ans. is 'a' obsessive compulsive disorder The person is suffering from obsessive compulsive disorder because he knows that the thoughts coming in his mind (to abuse god) are absurd & irrational (he is trying to resist it). This shows that the thoughts are "ego alien". This obsession or thought is followed by a behaviour which is performed with a sense of compulsion. So the diagnosis is O. C. N.
